pullrequest.title: Split out Sandia Hand plugin to use a single hand.

content.raw:
Looking at the list of services, everything looks good except for a few things:
~~~
/sandia_hands/set_joint_damping
/sandia_hands/get_joint_damping
~~~

and

~~~
/sandia_hands_l_hand_left_camera_info_relay/get_loggers
/sandia_hands_l_hand_left_camera_info_relay/set_logger_level
/sandia_hands_l_hand_left_image_raw_relay/get_loggers
/sandia_hands_l_hand_left_image_raw_relay/set_logger_level
/sandia_hands_l_hand_right_camera_info_relay/get_loggers
/sandia_hands_l_hand_right_camera_info_relay/set_logger_level
/sandia_hands_l_hand_right_image_raw_relay/get_loggers
/sandia_hands_l_hand_right_image_raw_relay/set_logger_level
/sandia_hands_l_hand_robot_state_publisher/get_loggers
/sandia_hands_l_hand_robot_state_publisher/set_logger_level
/sandia_hands_r_hand_left_camera_info_relay/get_loggers
/sandia_hands_r_hand_left_camera_info_relay/set_logger_level
/sandia_hands_r_hand_left_image_raw_relay/get_loggers
/sandia_hands_r_hand_left_image_raw_relay/set_logger_level
